name: hadith-shorts-ai
description: AI-powered YouTube Shorts generator for authentic Hadiths

scripts.start: echo 'Open index.html in your browser' && exit 0
scripts.build: mkdir -p public && cp -rf index.html index.tsx manifest.json sw.js types.ts constants.tsx metadata.json services components public/ && node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const f='public/services/geminiService.ts'; if(fs.existsSync(f)){const content=fs.readFileSync(f, 'utf8'); fs.writeFileSync(f, content.replace(/process\.env\.API_KEY/g, '\"' + (process.env.API_KEY || '') + '\"'));} else { console.log('File not found for key injection: ' + f); }"
